summary: This bill, the FinCEN–SBA Coordination on Beneficial Ownership Registration Act, mandates collaboration between the Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN) and the Small Business Administration (SBA). It requires them to establish a memorandum of understanding (MOU) to disseminate information on beneficial ownership reporting requirements under 31 U.S.C. § 5336. The MOU will focus on informing reporting companies, providing materials in multiple languages, linking to FinCEN resources, and countering related scams. Regular meetings and reports to Congress are also mandated to assess compliance and refine outreach strategies.
